characters.name: Alice
characters.description: Appears in My Little Pony Best Gift Ever and the Best Gift Ever storybooks A Present for Everypony and A Perfectly Pinkie Present! as one of the Gift Givers of the Grove. She is a character in Gameloft's mobile game. Her in-game description states, "One of the Legendary Gift Givers of the Grove, Alice knows about every gift that's yet to come." Voiced by Meaghan Hommy.

characters.name: King Aspen
characters.description: The leader of the Everfree Forest village of Thicket who harbors a deep resentment toward ponies in The Root of the Problem. Also appears on My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic Issue #50 page 20, on My Little Pony: Friends Forever Issue #38 page 4, in My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic Issue #61, on My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic Issue #67 page 2, on Issue #75, and on Issue #77. He is a character in Gameloft's mobile game.

characters.name: Aurora
characters.description: Appears in My Little Pony Best Gift Ever and the Best Gift Ever storybooks A Present for Everypony and A Perfectly Pinkie Present! as one of the Gift Givers of the Grove. She is a character in Gameloft's mobile game. Her in-game description states, "One of the legendary Gift Givers of the Grove, Aurora knows about every present that's already been given." Named the same as Zapp's secret identity, despite Jim Miller having stated that Starlight Glimmer "was originally called Aurora Glimmer, but Disney's got a lock on Aurora." Voiced by Asia Mattu.

characters.name: Blackthorn
characters.description: One of the deer living in the Everfree Forest village of Thicket in The Root of the Problem. Also appears in My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic Issue #61. He is a character in Gameloft's mobile game. The game's description of him states, "This stalwart guardian -- and one-time regent -- of the Everfree Forest is, reportedly, welcome at the Carousel Boutique 'any ol' time.' Hope Spike doesn't get jealous."

characters.name: Blitzen
characters.description: One of Santa Claus's reindeer mentioned by Aurora in My Little Pony Best Gift Ever. The Bestiary of Equestria page 63 quotes Professor Blitzen about Twittermites, "What potential difference can a Twittermite make? Currently, Twittermites are the spark that, if my shocking discoveries are true, could become a storm that hurts the ecosystem of Equestria! And it's all my volt... I mean fault."

characters.name: Bori
characters.description: Appears in My Little Pony Best Gift Ever and the Best Gift Ever storybooks A Present for Everypony and A Perfectly Pinkie Present! as one of the Gift Givers of the Grove. She is a character in Gameloft's mobile game. Her in-game description states, "One of the Legendary Gift Givers of the Grove, Bori knows that the truest gift is staying in the moment." Voiced by Alison Wandzura.

characters.name: Bramble
characters.description: The prince of Thicket and the son of King Aspen in The Root of the Problem. Also appears on My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic Issue #67 page 2. He is a character in Gameloft's mobile game.

characters.name: S04E14 Unnamed Deer #1
characters.description: Appears in Filli Vanilli and Fake It 'Til You Make It.

characters.name: S04E14 Unnamed Deer #2
characters.description: Appears in Filli Vanilli, Friendship Through the Ages, and Fake It 'Til You Make It.

characters.name: EG2 Unnamed Deer #1
characters.description: Appears in Shake your Tail! and Fluttershy Leans In.

characters.name: EG4 Unnamed Deer #1
characters.description: Appears in My Little Pony Equestria Girls: Legend of Everfree.

characters.name:
Chestnut Forest Guard
​[​specify​]​
characters.description: Appears on My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic Issue #28 page 13 and is a character called "Chestnut Forest Guard" in Gameloft's mobile game. Resembles Blackthorn.

characters.name:
Buckskin Forest Guard
​[​specify​]​
characters.description: Appears on My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic Issue #28 page 13 and is a character called "Buckskin Forest Guard" in Gameloft's mobile game.

characters.name:
Gray Forest-Dweller
​[​specify​]​
characters.description: Appears on My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic Issue #28 page 14 and is a character called "Gray Forest-Dweller" in Gameloft's mobile game.

characters.name:
Everfree Dignitary
​[​specify​]​
characters.description: Appears on My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic Issue #61 page 16 and is a character called "Everfree Dignitary" in Gameloft's mobile game. A similar deer appears on Issue #28 page 2 and Issue #61 page 8.
